description:
Recreate and train in these mid-range, performance boots. Their precise, enveloping fit offers good support, twist resistance, and control through each phase of your stride. The women’s-specific fit includes the lower leg as well as the foot, delivering more power, precision and comfort.

  • PVC lace covers with assymetric zip, frees your instep for comfort
  • Wintherm® micro-perforated membrane reflects foot heat back at you
  • Polyester thermo-adjustable liners can be heat molded for the perfect fit
  • 3D plastic reinforcements in the heel for pressure control and wear-resistance
  • Sport sole (NNN compatible) is stable and provides a precise kick with good boot-to-ski contact
name: Rossignol X8 FW Skate Boots - Women's
